description:
This Pilot Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 1 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

Kharl Zeon is a scatterbrained Expedition scientist whose quick-firing intellect often distracts him from everyday things like social niceties. 

* Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. This pack includes one digital Kharl Zeon Pilot.* 

* Starlink: Battle For Atlas Game required to play. Create a swirling vortex shield that absorbs incoming damage with Kharl's unique Pilot Ability.* *This pack is included in the Deluxe Edition of Starlink: Battle for Atlas™.
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Kharl Zeon Pilot Pack
